name: Weatherbit.io - Swagger UI Weather API documentation

requests.name: Returns Historical Observations - Given City and/or State, Country.
requests.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

queryParams.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR
Full name of state.
Country Code (2 letter).
Start Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).
End Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).
Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description
Language (Default: English) See language field description
Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func
Your registered API key.

requests.name: Download pre-generated bulk datasets
requests.description: **(Advanced/Advanced+/Enterprise plans only)** Downloads bulk data files - OPTIONS: (forecast16d.json.gz - 16 day forecasts for cities > 1000 population, current.json.gz - Current observations for cities > 1000 population).

queryParams.description: Filename (ie. forecast16d.json.gz)
Your registered API key.

requests.name: Returns a group of observations given a list of cities
requests.description: **(Advanced/Advanced+/Enterprise plans only)** Returns a group of Current Observations - Given a list of City IDs.

queryParams.description: Comma separated list of City ID's. Example: 4487042, 4494942, 4504871
Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description
Marine stations only (buoys, oil platforms, etc)
Language (Default: English) See language field description
Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func
Your registered API key.

requests.name: Returns a 3-hourly forecast - Given City and/or State, Country.
requests.description: Returns a 3-hourly forecast, where each point represents a three hour   period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

queryParams.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR
Full name of state.
Country Code (2 letter).
Number of days to return. Default 5.
Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description
Language (Default: English) See language field description
Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func
Your registered API key.

requests.name: Returns a daily forecast - Given City and/or State, Country.
requests.description: **(REQUIRED: Basic Plan or Higher)** Returns a daily forecast, where each point represents one day (24hr) period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". One day begins at 00:00 UTC, and ends at 23:59 UTC. Accepts a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

queryParams.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR
Full name of state.
Country Code (2 letter).
Number of days to return. Default 5.
Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description
Language (Default: English) See language field description
Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func
Your registered API key.

The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

Country Code (2 letter).
Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description
Language (Default: English) See language field description
Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func
Number of hours to return.

requests.name: Returns multiple locations given a bounding box.
requests.description: Returns aggregate energy specific historical weather fields, over a specified time period. Supply a bounding box ex: lat1=40&lon1=-78&lat2=38&lon2=-80. This API will return UP TO 150 stations, aggregated by the specified time period start_date to end_date.

queryParams.description: Latitude of upper left corner.
Longitude of upper left corner.
Latitude of lower right corner.
Longitude of lower right corner.
Start Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).
End Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).
Temperature threshold to use to calculate degree days (default 18 C)
Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description
Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func
Your registered API key.

requests.name: Returns Energy API response  - Given a single lat/lon.
requests.description: Returns aggregate energy specific historical weather fields, over a specified time period.

queryParams.description: Latitude component of location.
Longitude component of location.
Start Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).
End Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).
Time period to aggregate by (daily, monthly)
Temperature threshold to use to calculate degree days (default 18 C)
Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description
Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func
Your registered API key.

requests.name: Returns an Geolocation object.
requests.description: Returns a geolocation object. Given an IP address. If no IP supplied, will use request IP address.

queryParams.description: IP Address, or auto. Example: ip=auto
Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func
exclude=all => return IP address only
&format=none => return IP address as string
Your registered API key.
